trans-unit.source: Ordersv2 is the next iteration of Planet's API in getting Analysis Ready Data (ARD) delivered to you. Orders v2 allows you to improved functionality in this domain, including capability to submit an number of images in a batch order, and perform operations such as top of atmospheric reflectance, compression, coregistration and also enhanced notifications such as email and webhooks. Based on your access you can use this tool to chain together a sequence of operations. This tool is a command line interface that allows you to interact with the ordersv2 API along with place orders and download orders as needed. The tool also allows you to chain multiple processes together and additional functionalities will be added as needed. For exporting to cloud storages release 0.0.8 onwards has a configuration folder with config yml structures to be used with this tool. Simply replaces the fields as needed.
trans-unit.target: Ordersv2 is the next iteration of Planet's API in getting Analysis Ready Data (ARD) delivered to you. Orders v2 allows you to improved functionality in this domain, including capability to submit an number of images in a batch order, and perform operations such as top of atmospheric reflectance, compression, coregistration and also enhanced notifications such as email and webhooks. Based on your access you can use this tool to chain together a sequence of operations. This tool is a command line interface that allows you to interact with the ordersv2 API along with place orders and download orders as needed. The tool also allows you to chain multiple processes together and additional functionalities will be added as needed. For exporting to cloud storages release 0.0.8 onwards has a configuration folder with config yml structures to be used with this tool. Simply replaces the fields as needed.

trans-unit.source: Create an idlist for your geometry based on some basic filters,including geometry, start and end date and cloud cover. If no cloud cover is specified everything form 0 to 100% cloud cover is included. For now the tool can handle geojson,json and kml files. The output is a csv file with ids. The tool also allows you to make sure you get percentage overlap, when selecting image, for clip operations adjust it accordingly (usally --ovp 1 for orders not to fail during clip). The tool now also prints estimated area in Square kilometes for the download and estimated area if you clipped your area with the geometry you are searching (just estimates). You can now pass multiple assetswith the idlist tool pass assets as analytic_sr,udm2 for example to get items with both these assets ``` --asset analytic_sr,udm2.
trans-unit.target: 根据一些基本的过滤器为您的几何体创建一个ID列表,包括几何体、开始和结束日期以及云层。如果没有指定云层,则包括0到100%的云层。目前该工具可以处理geojson、json和kml文件。输出是一个带有ids的csv文件。该工具还允许你确保你得到的百分比重叠,当选择图像,为剪辑操作相应地调整它(通常--ovp 1的命令,以避免在剪辑期间失败)。该工具现在还可以打印下载的估计面积(以平方公里为单位)和估计面积(如果你用搜索的几何体剪裁了你的区域)(只是估计)。你现在可以用idlist工具传递多个assets,例如传递assets为analytic_sr,udm2,以获得同时包含这些assets的项目```-asset analytic_sr,udm2。

trans-unit.source: For example if an item id '20181227_125554_0f4c' does not have surface reflectance asset type. So if you try to download this using bundle type analytic_sr_udm2 it will not work, similary if you order an item where a specific operation cannot be performed for example if you order visual and then try to do bandmath with four bands. These examples and more are where fallback bundles come in handy. Think of this as providing a list of bundles to keep trying if one bundle type fails. The priority goes left to right. You can provide comma seperated fallback bundles for example as
trans-unit.target: For example if an item id '20181227_125554_0f4c' does not have surface reflectance asset type. So if you try to download this using bundle type analytic_sr_udm2 it will not work, similary if you order an item where a specific operation cannot be performed for example if you order visual and then try to do bandmath with four bands. These examples and more are where fallback bundles come in handy. Think of this as providing a list of bundles to keep trying if one bundle type fails. The priority goes left to right. You can provide comma seperated fallback bundles for example as

trans-unit.source: For my windows machine, I have both 32-bit python 2.7.16 and 64-bit Python 3.6.6. You can get the python version at the beginning of the highlighted lines and the 32 or 64 bit within the Intel or AMD64 within the square brackets. Your default python is the one you get by just typing python in the command line. Then download the following packages based on the information we collect about our python type in the earlier step. We use unofficial binaries to install these. This step is only needed if you are on a windows machine if you are using a setup manager like anaconda you might be able to avoid this setup completely
trans-unit.target: For my windows machine, I have both 32-bit python 2.7.16 and 64-bit Python 3.6.6. Your default python is the one you get by just typing python in the command line. Then download the following packages based on the information we collect about our python type in the earlier step. We use unofficial binaries to install these. This step is only needed if you are on a windows machine if you are using a setup manager like anaconda you might be able to avoid this setup completely

trans-unit.source: It is possible for you to modify the idlist, add or remove ids. Once done, this tool allows you to estimate the total area of images and area that intersect with your geometry or area if clipped.

trans-unit.source: It is possible to often forget about the different asset types, so you can now not pass an item and the script will return every possible type of asset for each item type depending on the bundle.

trans-unit.source: It is possible you already downloaded some images or metadata files, and your you want a difference idlist to create orders for only assets and item types you do not have. It takes in your local folder path, type image or metadata and some basic filters,including geometry, start and end date and cloud cover. If no cloud cover is specified everything form 0 to 100% cloud cover is included. For now the tool can handle geojson,json and kml files. The output is a csv file with ids.
trans-unit.target: 有可能你已经下载了一些图像或元数据文件,而你想要一个不同的idlist来为你没有的资产和项目类型创建订单。它需要您的本地文件夹路径、图像或元数据类型以及一些基本的过滤器,包括几何形状、开始和结束日期以及云层。如果没有指定云层,则包括0到100%的云层。目前该工具可以处理geojson、json和kml文件。输出是一个带有ids的csv文件。

trans-unit.source: Order size tool is optimized for speed.
trans-unit.target: 订单尺寸工具经过优化,速度更快。

trans-unit.source: Ordering using ordersv2 uses the concept of bundles. A bundle is a combination of multiple assets for an item that come together and are delivered as part of the overall fulfillment of the order. For example an analytic asset for PSScene4Band is a single tif file, however the analytic bundle for PSScene4Band includes analytic tiff file, the analytic_xml metadata and the udm data mask file as part of the bundle. You can find more information about bundles here. Thus the concept of bundles bring together single function to order and download multiple related assets. Since the list of bundles is long, this tool simply allows you to get every bundle type based on item type. The setup is simple
trans-unit.target: Ordering using ordersv2 uses the concept of bundles. A bundle is a combination of multiple assets for an item that come together and are delivered as part of the overall fulfillment of the order. For example an analytic asset for PSScene4Band is a single tif file, however the analytic bundle for PSScene4Band includes analytic tiff file, the analytic_xml metadata and the udm data mask file as part of the bundle. You can find more information about bundles here. Thus the concept of bundles bring together single function to order and download multiple related assets. Since the list of bundles is long, this tool simply allows you to get every bundle type based on item type. The setup is simple

trans-unit.source: Orders clip tool can now handle multipolygon clip
trans-unit.target: 订单夹工具现在可以处理多多边形夹。

trans-unit.source: Overall general improvements to the tool
Overall optimization for faster check and updated readme for fallback bundles.
trans-unit.target: 全面优化,加快检查速度,并更新了回退捆绑的readme。

trans-unit.source: Parses possible asset types if only item type is supplied for idlist
trans-unit.target: 如果只提供idlist的项目类型,则解析可能的资产类型。

trans-unit.source: Polling for order to complete and automatically download
trans-unit.target: 投票,以完成订单并自动下载

trans-unit.source: Python 2.7 will reach the end of its life on January 1st, 2020. No more python 2 support from v0.5.9
trans-unit.target: Python 2.7将在2020年1月1日结束其生命。从 v0.5.9 开始不再支持 python 2。

trans-unit.source: Re-release of python 3 only supported version. Use upto version 0.5.7 only for Python 2.
trans-unit.target: 重新发布的python 3只支持版本。只对Python 2使用到0.5.7版本。

trans-unit.source: Removed dependency on pendulum and general cleanup.
trans-unit.target: 去除了对钟摆的依赖,并进行了全面清理。

trans-unit.source: Removed deprecated bundles from bundles list.
trans-unit.target: 从bundles列表中删除了不适用的bundles。
删除了持久版本的打印

trans-unit.source: Replaced asset in order tool with bundles.
trans-unit.target: 用捆绑工具取代了订单中的资产。

trans-unit.source: Replaced concurrency check with stats endpoint to get queued and running orders.
trans-unit.target: 用统计端点替换了并发检查,以获取排队和运行中的订单。

trans-unit.source: Shapely and a few other libraries are notoriously difficult to install on windows machines so follow the steps mentioned here before installing porder. You can download and install shapely and other libraries from the Unofficial Wheel files from here download depending on the python version you have. Do this only once you have install GDAL. I would recommend the steps mentioned above to get the GDAL properly installed. However I am including instructions to using a precompiled version of GDAL similar to the other libraries on windows. You can test to see if you have gdal by simply running
trans-unit.target: Shapely and a few other libraries are notoriously difficult to install on windows machines so follow the steps mentioned here before installing porder. You can download and install shapely and other libraries from the Unofficial Wheel files from here download depending on the python version you have. Do this only once you have install GDAL. I would recommend the steps mentioned above to get the GDAL properly installed. However I am including instructions to using a precompiled version of GDAL similar to the other libraries on windows. You can test to see if you have gdal by simply running

trans-unit.source: Simple CLI for Planet Orders v2
Simple and multipart downloader now show number of items remaining during the download.
trans-unit.target: 简单和多部分下载器现在显示下载过程中剩余的项目数量。

trans-unit.source: Simply run porder -h after installation. This should go fetch the extra libraries you need and install them. Once installation is complete, the porder help page will show up. This should save you from the few steps below.
trans-unit.target: Simply run porder -h after installation. This should go fetch the extra libraries you need and install them. Once installation is complete, the porder help page will show up. This should save you from the few steps below.

trans-unit.source: Skysat area are calculated using EPSG:3857 to resolve metadata EPSG issue
trans-unit.target: 天空的面积是用EPSG:3857来计算的,以解决元数据EPSG的问题。

trans-unit.source: The allows you to download the files in your order, to a local folder. It uses the order url generated using the orders tool to access and download the files.
trans-unit.target: 它允许您将订单中的文件下载到本地文件夹。它使用订单工具生成的订单网址来访问和下载文件。

trans-unit.source: The allows you to multipart download the files in your order, this uses a multiprocessing downloader to quickly download your files to a local folder. It uses the order url generated using the orders tool to access and download the files.
trans-unit.target: 允许您多部分下载您订单中的文件,这使用多进程下载器快速下载您的文件到本地文件夹。它使用订单工具生成的订单网址来访问和下载文件。

trans-unit.source: The idlist tool can now use a multipolygon and iteratively look for scenes.
trans-unit.target: idlist工具现在可以使用多多边形并反复寻找场景。

trans-unit.source: The list of operations for the --op are below and ** the order of these operations is important**
trans-unit.target: The list of operations for the --op are below and ** the order of these operations is important**

trans-unit.source: The number option is optional, so it can look for all images in the time range, but be careful if the area is too large, use at own risk. A better option is to supply the number.
trans-unit.target: The number option is optional, so it can look for all images in the time range, but be careful if the area is too large, use at own risk. A better option is to supply the number.

trans-unit.source: The same setup with delivery of each image, its metadata as a zip file would be. Note how we only added zip to the op list
trans-unit.target: 同样的设置,每个图像的交付,它的元数据作为一个zip文件将是。请注意,我们只将zip文件添加到操作列表中。

trans-unit.source: The setup to check failed orders would be for example the following, You can place a limit on the number of orders to get by using --limit
trans-unit.target: 例如,检查失败订单的设置如下,您可以使用--limit来限制订单的数量。

trans-unit.source: The tool allows you to check on number of running and queued orders for both organization and user level. Using this is simple
trans-unit.target: 该工具允许您检查组织和用户级别的运行和排队订单的数量。使用这个工具很简单

trans-unit.source: The tool is designed to simplify using the ordersv2 API and allows the user to chain together tools and operations for multiple item and asset types and perform these operations and download the assets locally.
trans-unit.target: 该工具旨在简化使用 ordersv2 API,并允许用户将多个项目和资产类型的工具和操作链在一起,并执行这些操作并将资产下载到本地。

trans-unit.source: The tool now allows you to estimate the total download size for a specific order.
trans-unit.target: 该工具现在允许您估计特定订单的总下载大小。

trans-unit.source: The uses the multiprocessing library to quickly download your files to a local folder. It uses the order url generated using the orders tool to access and download the files and includes an expotential rate limiting function to handle too many requests. To save on time it uses an extension filter so for example if you are using the zip operation you can use ".zip" and if you are downloading only images, udm and xml you can use ".tif" or ".xml" accordingly. For python 3.4 or higher, this switches to using an true async downloader instead of using multiprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 使用多处理库快速下载文件到本地文件夹。它使用订单工具生成的订单网址来访问和下载文件,并包含一个指数率限制功能来处理过多的请求。为了节省时间,它使用了一个扩展过滤器,例如,如果你使用zip操作,你可以使用".zip",如果你只下载图片、udm和xml,你可以相应地使用".tif "或".xml"。对于python 3.4或更高版本,这将切换到使用真正的异步下载器,而不是使用多处理。

trans-unit.source: Then follow along the following libraries
trans-unit.target: 然后沿着下面的图书馆

trans-unit.source: Then simply install the wheel files you downloaded using the following setup
trans-unit.target: 然后只需使用以下设置安装您下载的轮子文件即可。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to split your idlist into small csv files incase you wanted to created batches of orders.
trans-unit.target: 这允许您将您的idlist分割成小的csv文件,以防您想创建批量的订单。

trans-unit.source: This assumes that you have native python & pip installed in your system, you can test this by going to the terminal (or windows command prompt) and trying. I recommend installation within virtual environment if you are worries about messing up your current environment.
trans-unit.target: This assumes that you have native python & pip installed in your system, you can test this by going to the terminal (or windows command prompt) and trying. I recommend installation within virtual environment if you are worries about messing up your current environment.

trans-unit.source: This does exactly as it sounds, it encodes your credential files to base64 for use with gcs.
trans-unit.target: 这就像它的名字一样,它将你的证书文件编码为base64,供gcs使用。

trans-unit.source: This reduces the number of vertices for a multi vertex and complex GeoJSON. Extremely high vertex count (over 500) seem to fail and hence this tool allows you to export a new geojson with reduced vertices. It uses an implementation of the Visvalingam-Wyatt line simplification algorithm. This tool does work with and without Fiona, but Fiona installation is recommended.
trans-unit.target: 这可以减少多顶点和复杂GeoJSON的顶点数量。极高的顶点数量(超过500个)似乎会失败,因此这个工具允许你导出一个新的减少顶点的geojson。它使用了Visvalingam-Wyatt线简化算法的实现。这个工具可以和Fiona一起使用,也可以不使用,但建议安装Fiona。

trans-unit.source: This tool allows you to actually place the order using the idlist that you created earlier. the --op argument allows you to take operations, delivery and notifications in a sequence for example --op toar clip email performs Top of Atmospheric reflectance, followed by clipping to your geometry and send you an email notification once the order has completed, failed or had any any change of status. An important changes is the concept of passing bundles instead of using assets. Bundles are predefined meaning all assets in a bundle are not available for an item your attempt at downloading that attempt will fail.
trans-unit.target: This tool allows you to actually place the order using the idlist that you created earlier. the --op argument allows you to take operations, delivery and notifications in a sequence for example --op toar clip email performs Top of Atmospheric reflectance, followed by clipping to your geometry and send you an email notification once the order has completed, failed or had any any change of status. An important changes is the concept of passing bundles instead of using assets. Bundles are predefined meaning all assets in a bundle are not available for an item your attempt at downloading that attempt will fail.

trans-unit.source: This tool allows you to convert from a folder with multiple shapefiles or kml files to a folder with geojson that can then be used with the tool. It makes use of geopandas and reprojects your shapefile to make it compatible while passing onto the API for search and download. KML conversions are handled seperately.
trans-unit.target: 这个工具可以让你从一个有多个shapefile或kml文件的文件夹转换到一个有geojson的文件夹,然后可以使用这个工具。它利用geopandas并重构你的shapefile使其兼容,同时传递到API上进行搜索和下载。KML的转换是单独处理的。

trans-unit.source: This tool allows you to get the list of orders based on the states and based on the start and end dates of orders. For example if you want to find out all orders that failed within the week you can use this tool to check that.
trans-unit.target: 这个工具可以让您获得基于状态和基于订单开始和结束日期的订单列表。例如,如果您想找出一周内所有失败的订单,您可以使用这个工具来检查。

trans-unit.source: This tool allows you to reorder an existing order with the same item ids and tools. This is trying to look into the overall structures of existing orders and maybe useful to reorder if an order fails for example.
trans-unit.target: 这个工具可以让你用相同的物品id和工具对现有订单进行重新排序。这是想研究现有订单的整体结构,如果一个订单失败了,也许对重新排序很有用,例如。

trans-unit.target: 要选择适合自己的版本,使用之前收集到的python信息 例如我的python 3.6.6和AMD 64,如果我安装shapely,我会选择如下,这里36指的是python 3.6,amd64指的是我们说的64位。

trans-unit.source: To obtain help for a specific functionality, simply call it with help switch, e.g.: porder idlist -h. If you didn't install porder, then you can run it just by going to porder directory and running python porder.py [arguments go here]
trans-unit.target: To obtain help for a specific functionality, simply call it with help switch, e.g.: porder idlist -h . If you didn't install porder, then you can run it just by going to porder directory and running python porder.py [arguments go here]

trans-unit.source: Updated readme to do bulk conversion from Shapefile and KML to geojson.

trans-unit.source: Updates information while waiting for idlist
Used file basename for splitting the idlist.

You can cancel a queued order or cancel all queued orders, before the status changes to running. Simply put you can cancel a specific order before it starts running or cancel all of your queued orders.

Once there if I am installing for my python 3.6 the command was. At this point we will make use of our trusted package installer that comes with python called pip. Note the choice of pip or pip3 depends on your python version usually you can get the pip to use with your python by typing
